column3: ADVISORY | As of posting, the UNC Admin HAVE NOT YET released any official announcement regarding the suspension of classes and work for the upcoming special holidays, namely Jesse Robredo Day (August 18), Ninoy Aquino Day (August 21), and Eid'l Adha (August 21). https://t.co/OAF1pC4BdE

ADVISORY

Class suspension posted earlier due to power outage has been lifted. 7 am classes resume today for the students' exam preparation. 

Thank you.
